Models¶

Database descriptions

Models for the Superhero database. Contains all data necessary for the API

class superheroes.models.City(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

One city. This is the main base city of the superhero.

An enemy of a Superhero – typically a supervillain.

class superheroes.models.Power(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

A superpower. May be attached to either a Superhero or an Enemy. Name should be short and distinctive. Description can be verbose.
